statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Davis leads Pepperdine to 50-47 win in WCC quarterfinal
article.headline: Davis leads Pepperdine to 50-47 win in WCC quarterfinal
article.linkText: Davis leads Pepperdine to 50-47 win in WCC quarterfinal
article.story: LAS VEGAS -- Stacy Davis scored 19 points and Pepperdine rallied to beat San Diego 50-47 on Saturday in a West Coast Conference quarterfinal. Monday, the Waves (18-12) play Gonzaga, which beat San Francisco 81-72 on Saturday, in their first WCC semifinal appearance since 2004. Davis' layup with 2:05 left gave the Waves a 48-45 lead. Brandon Perry's dunk cut the margin to one with 45 seconds remaining. After Davis was thwarted on a drive, USD's Johnny Dee put up a floater that missed as did a putback by Vasa Pusica with two seconds left. Shawn Olden sank two free throws for the final score. The Toreros (15-16) led 24-18 at halftime with both teams shooting in the low-30 percent range. Pepperdine warmed up to 48 percent in the second half but not USD. The Toreros hung in with 19 offensive rebounds for the game. Dee and Pusica had 11 points each and Perry 10.
